select count(*) from hdg_exchange_whitelist, bas_system_battery_type
agent_id = #{agentId}

mapper.insert: insert into hdg_exchange_whitelist (agent_id, customer_id, mobile, fullname, battery_type, create_time) VALUES (#{agentId}, #{customerId}, #{mobile}, #{fullname}, #{batteryType}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update hdg_exchange_whitelist set agent_id = #{agentId}, customer_id = #{customerId}, battery_type = #{batteryType}, mobile = #{mobile}, fullname = #{fullname}, create_time = #{createTime} where id = #{id}
